data.actual_result: It appears for one second each time a message is posted
data.expected_result: Unread button should never appear for the current channel you're viewing
data.short_description: Unreads button appears for a second everytime a message is posted in the channel you're  currently viewing (if the server has no other unreads)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server entirely marked as read, with a lot of channels - Switch to the most active channel in the server  - Scroll in channel list so the channel is offscreen - Look at channel list while new messages are being sent in the channel by other users
